select a.stcd, a.tm, a.z, a.q, a.xsa, a.xsavv, a.xsmxv, a.flwchrcd, a.wptn, a.msqmt, a.msamt, a.msvmt, b.stnm, b.rvnm, b.hnnm, b.bsnm, b.lgtd, b.lttd, b.stlc, b.addvcd, b.dtmnm, b.dtmel, b.dtpr, b.sttp, b.frgrd, b.esstym, b.bgfrym, b.atcunit, b.admauth, b.locality, b.stbk, b.stazt, b.dstrvm, b.drna, b.phcd, b.usfl, b.comments, b.moditime, c.adcd, c.adnm, d.ldkel, d.rdkel, d.wrz, d.wrq, d.grz, d.grq, d.flpq, d.obhtz, d.obhtztm, d.ivhz, d.ivhztm, d.obmxq, d.obmxqtm, d.ivmxq, d.ivmxqtm, d.hmxs, d.hmxstm, d.hmxavv, d.hmxavvtm, d.hlz, d.hlztm, d.hmnq, d.hmnqtm, d.taz, d.taq, d.laz, d.laq, d.sfz, d.sfq, d.moditime from ST_RIVER_R a
left join ST_STBPRP_B b on a.stcd = b.stcd left join DJ_AD c on b.addvcd = c.adcd left join ST_RVFCCH_B d on a.stcd = d.stcd left join ST_STSMTASK_B e on a.stcd = e.stcd
where a.stcd = #{stcd} and a.tm > #{stm} and a.tm <= #{etm} and b.sttp like '%z%' and e.ZFL = 1 order by a.tm desc

from ST_RSVR_R a
left join ST_STBPRP_B b on a.stcd = b.stcd left join DJ_AD c on b.addvcd = c.adcd left join ST_RSVRFSR_B d on a.stcd = d.stcd left join ST_STSMTASK_B e on a.stcd = e.stcd
